welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Altdorf, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but users must re-login every 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ingolstadt-manching Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wallmuhle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
